# [Interview #977: Cosmere Q&A - 17th Shard, Entry #188](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=977#188)

#### Cheese Ninja

Is it hypothetically possible to Awaken an object using a Divine Breath?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Yes
